h2_title: Where to Find First Prince of Flowing Sands
h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands
content: Even as big as he is with a larger health pool, he’s not as ferocious as the enraged Second Prince. Do note however there is a **secret trick in this fight** : If you lure him into doing one of his larger slam attacks while your back is to the curved wall, his strikes may cause the wall to crack - revealing a secret!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'First_Prince_of_Flowing_Sands.md', within the main section titled 'First Prince of Flowing Sands', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find First Prince of Flowing Sands' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - First Prince of Flowing Sands'.
The content is as follows:
Even as big as he is with a larger health pool, he’s not as ferocious as the enraged Second Prince. Do note however there is a **secret trick in this fight** : If you lure him into doing one of his larger slam attacks while your back is to the curved wall, his strikes may cause the wall to crack - revealing a secret!
